stripped_text: Root of HQ or R&D only. Whenever the Runner breaches this server, they access 3 additional cards. When the breach ends, gain 2 credits for each time the Runner accessed a card during that breach. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Root of HQ or R&D only. Whenever the Runner breaches this server, they access 3 additional cards. When the breach ends, gain 2[credit] for each time the Runner accessed a card during that breach. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Mwanza City Grid
